thread.section_title: Adagio Access La Defense Place Charras - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Homely Accommodation
thread.title_full: Good Homely Accommodation - Review of Adagio Access La Defense Place Charras, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: MainakBandyopadhyay
title: Good Homely Accommodation
text:
You can select this property primarily if you are:
1. In a Business or family trip around La Defense area
2. Looking for a location where you would get everything nearby
This is a decent place where I stayed twice and the last time was in Feb 2017. La Defense office area / metro station etc. are all within walk-able distance (10-15 mins). If you want to cook, do so at room where you have all utensils. You would get Auchan & Carrefour markets very close to it. There are other shops too.
If you do not want to cook, you would get Subway / other restaurants very close by. Having kids? You will get a park just opposite to it. Need SIM card? You would get small phone shops very close. What else would you need?
The breakfast is just ok. The reception is open 24 X 7. Only thing that they could have done is to have a housekeeping free of cost offered in the middle of one week stay. Just read the T&C at the time of booking to have correct expectation on housekeeping.
